algorithmDesc.anomaly_detection: Detect abnormal fluctuations in operational metrics such as CPU spikes, memory leaks, and network traffic anomalies to help identify root causes quickly.
algorithmDesc.timeseries_predict: Predict future trends based on historical monitoring data for capacity planning, resource scheduling, and dynamic alert threshold adjustment.
algorithmDesc.classification: Intelligently classify operational text such as ticket types, alert severity levels, and fault categories to improve automation.
algorithmDesc.image_classification: Recognize operational image content such as equipment status, dashboard screenshots, and topology diagrams for visual operations scenarios.
algorithmDesc.object_detection: Detect specific objects in images such as cabinet labels, device locations, and abnormal indicator lights for data center inspection.
algorithmDesc.log_clustering: Intelligently cluster massive logs to discover patterns, reduce alert noise, and accelerate troubleshooting.
